Class Controlador

java.lang.Object
edu.uptc.Controlador.Controlador
public class Controlador extends Object
Controller class that acts as an intermediary between the GUI and the Service layer. This class follows the MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern, handling all requests from the presentation layer and delegating business logic to the Servicios class. The controller validates input from the GUI and manages the flow of data between the view and the model, ensuring proper separation of concerns.
See Also:
  • Servicios
  • Gui

  • Constructor Details

    • Controlador

      public Controlador()
      Constructor that initializes the controller with a new Servicios instance. The Servicios instance manages all business operations and data structures.

  • Method Details

    • registrarCliente

      public String registrarCliente(String cedula, String nombre, String apellido, LocalDate fechaNacimiento, String pais, String departamento, String ciudad, String numeroCelular, String contrasena) throws ClienteNocreado
      Registers a new client in the system. Delegates the registration process to the service layer after receiving all necessary client information from the GUI.
      Parameters:
      cedula - Client's ID number (unique identifier)
      nombre - Client's first name
      apellido - Client's last name
      fechaNacimiento - Client's birth date
      pais - Client's country of residence
      departamento - Client's department/state
      ciudad - Client's city
      numeroCelular - Client's mobile phone number
      contrasena - Client's password for authentication
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the client was registered
      Throws:
      ClienteNocreado - if any required field is null, empty, or registration fails

    • registrarAsesor

      public String registrarAsesor(String cedula, String nombre, String apellido, LocalDate fechaNacimiento, String pais, String departamento, String ciudad, String contrasena) throws AsesorNocreado
      Registers a new advisor in the system. Delegates the registration process to the service layer after receiving all necessary advisor information from the GUI.
      Parameters:
      cedula - Advisor's ID number (unique identifier)
      nombre - Advisor's first name
      apellido - Advisor's last name
      fechaNacimiento - Advisor's birth date
      pais - Advisor's country of residence
      departamento - Advisor's department/state
      ciudad - Advisor's city
      contrasena - Advisor's password for authentication
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the advisor was registered
      Throws:
      AsesorNocreado - if any required field is null, empty, or registration fails

    • buscarPorIdUsuarios

      public Usuario buscarPorIdUsuarios(String id) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Searches for a user by their ID in the system. Can return any type of user (Admin, Advisor, or Client).
      Parameters:
      id - The user's ID (cedula) to search for
      Returns:
      The Usuario object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the user with the given ID does not exist

    • login

      public String login(String id, String contrasena) throws ContrasenaVacia
      Authenticates a user and determines their role in the system. Validates the user's credentials and returns their type (ADMIN, ASESOR, or CLIENTE).
      Parameters:
      id - User's ID (cedula)
      contrasena - User's password
      Returns:
      String indicating the user type: "ADMIN", "ASESOR", or "CLIENTE"
      Throws:
      ContrasenaVacia - if credentials are incorrect, user not found, or password is empty

    • obtenerUsuarioActual

      public Usuario obtenerUsuarioActual(String idCliente)
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user information. Used by the GUI to maintain user session data.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - The user's ID (cedula)
      Returns:
      The Usuario object corresponding to the given ID

    • registrarPlanMovil

      public String registrarPlanMovil(String idCliente, int minutos, double gigas, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, MinutosGigasnegativos
      Registers a new mobile plan for a specific client. The plan is immediately added to the client's list of contracted plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who will own the plan
      minutos - Number of voice minutes included in the plan
      gigas - Amount of mobile data in gigabytes
      valorServicio - Base monthly service cost
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied (0-100)
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the plan was registered
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client with the given ID is not found
      MinutosGigasnegativos - if minutes or gigas are less than or equal to zero

    • registrarPlanHogar

      public String registrarPlanHogar(String idCliente, String tipoTV, int megasInternet, double valorServicio, double descuento) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, MegasNegativas, TipoTVincorrectos
      Registers a new home plan for a specific client. The plan is immediately added to the client's list of contracted plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who will own the plan
      tipoTV - Type of TV service: "digital" or "analoga"
      megasInternet - Internet speed in megabytes per second
      valorServicio - Base monthly service cost
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied (0-100)
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the plan was registered
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client with the given ID is not found
      MegasNegativas - if internet megas are less than or equal to zero
      TipoTVincorrectos - if TV type is not "digital" or "analoga"

    • registrarPQRS

      public String registrarPQRS(String idCliente, int tipo, String descripcion, int idPlan) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, NoExistePlan
      Registers a new PQRS (Petition, Complaint, Claim, or Suggestion) for a client. The PQRS must be associated with an existing plan owned by the client.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who is submitting the PQRS
      tipo - Type of PQRS: 1=Peticion, 2=Queja, 3=Reclamo, 4=Sugerencia
      descripcion - Detailed description of the PQRS
      idPlan - ID of the plan this PQRS is related to
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the PQRS was registered
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      NoExistePlan - if the plan with the given ID does not exist or doesn't belong to the client

    • obtenerTodasPQRSAsesor

      public String obtenerTodasPQRSAsesor(String idAsesor) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all PQRS that have been managed by a specific advisor. Used by administrators to monitor advisor performance.
      Parameters:
      idAsesor - Advisor's ID
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all PQRS managed by the advisor
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the advisor is not found

    • obtenerPQRSCliente

      public String obtenerPQRSCliente(String idCliente) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all PQRS submitted by a specific client. Used by clients to view their own requests and by advisors to view client history.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all PQRS submitted by the client
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • obtenerTodosPQRS

      public String obtenerTodosPQRS() throws PQRSNoEncontrada
      Retrieves all PQRS registered in the system with detailed information. Includes type-specific fields for each PQRS (resolution status, importance levels, etc.). Used primarily by advisors to view all pending and resolved requests.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all PQRS in the system
      Throws:
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if there are no PQRS registered in the system

    • obtenerPlanesCliente

      public String obtenerPlanesCliente(String idCliente) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Retrieves all plans contracted by a specific client. Shows detailed information for each plan including monthly payment and total cost.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all client's plans with payment details
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • solucionarPQRS

      public String solucionarPQRS(String idAsesor, int idPQRS, String solucion, int nivelesAux) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, PQRSNoEncontrada
      Resolves a PQRS by recording the advisor's solution. Different actions are taken based on the PQRS type: - Peticion: marks as resolved and adds solution concept - Queja: sets dissatisfaction level and marks as reviewed - Reclamo: adds compensation resource and marks as resolved - Sugerencia: sets importance level The PQRS is added to the advisor's list of managed requests.
      Parameters:
      idAsesor - Advisor's ID who is resolving the PQRS
      idPQRS - ID of the PQRS to be resolved
      solucion - Solution text or compensation details (used for Peticion and Reclamo)
      nivelesAux - Auxiliary level value (used for Queja and Sugerencia importance/dissatisfaction levels)
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the PQRS was resolved
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the advisor is not found
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS with the given ID is not found

    • modificarPQRS

      public String modificarPQRS(String idCliente, int idPQRS, String nuevaDescripcion) throws UsuarioNoencontrado, PQRSNoEncontrada
      Modifies the description of an existing PQRS. Only the client who owns the PQRS can modify it.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who owns the PQRS
      idPQRS - ID of the PQRS to be modified
      nuevaDescripcion - New description text to replace the current one
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the PQRS was modified
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS is not found or doesn't belong to the client

    • eliminarPQRSCliente

      public String eliminarPQRSCliente(int idPQRS, String idUsuario) throws PQRSNoEncontrada
      Deletes a PQRS from the system. Removes the PQRS from both the client's personal list and the system's global list. Only the client who owns the PQRS can delete it.
      Parameters:
      idPQRS - ID of the PQRS to be deleted
      idUsuario - Client's ID who owns the PQRS
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the PQRS was deleted
      Throws:
      PQRSNoEncontrada - if the PQRS is not found or doesn't belong to the client

    • eliminarAsesor

      public String eliminarAsesor(String cedula) throws AsesorNocreado
      Removes an advisor from the system. An advisor can only be deleted if they have no managed requests. This is an administrative function to maintain system integrity.
      Parameters:
      cedula - ID of the advisor to be deleted
      Returns:
      Success message or information message if deletion is not possible
      Throws:
      AsesorNocreado - if the advisor is not found

    • obtenerAsesores

      public String obtenerAsesores()
      Retrieves all advisors registered in the system. Used by administrators to view and manage the advisor workforce.
      Returns:
      String containing all Asesor objects in the system

    • crearPlanMovilAdmin

      public String crearPlanMovilAdmin(int minutos, double gigas, double valor, double descuento) throws MinutosGigasnegativos
      Creates a new mobile plan template in the available plans catalog. This is an administrative function that populates the catalog of plans that clients can choose to contract.
      Parameters:
      minutos - Number of voice minutes included in the plan
      gigas - Amount of mobile data in gigabytes
      valor - Base monthly service cost
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied (0-100)
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the plan template was created
      Throws:
      MinutosGigasnegativos - if minutes or gigas are less than or equal to zero

    • crearPlanHogarAdmin

      public String crearPlanHogarAdmin(String tipoTV, int megas, double valor, double descuento) throws MegasNegativas, TipoTVincorrectos
      Creates a new home plan template in the available plans catalog. This is an administrative function that populates the catalog of plans that clients can choose to contract.
      Parameters:
      tipoTV - Type of TV service: "digital" or "analoga"
      megas - Internet speed in megabytes per second
      valor - Base monthly service cost
      descuento - Discount percentage to be applied (0-100)
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the plan template was created
      Throws:
      MegasNegativas - if internet megas are less than or equal to zero
      TipoTVincorrectos - if TV type is not "digital" or "analoga"

    • obtenerPlanesMovilesDisponibles

      public String obtenerPlanesMovilesDisponibles()
      Retrieves all available mobile plans from the catalog. Shows plan details and monthly payment for each plan. Used by clients to browse available plans before contracting.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all available mobile plans with their details

    • obtenerPlanesHogarDisponibles

      public String obtenerPlanesHogarDisponibles()
      Retrieves all available home plans from the catalog. Shows plan details and monthly payment for each plan. Used by clients to browse available plans before contracting.
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing all available home plans with their details

    • seleccionarPlanDisponible

      public String seleccionarPlanDisponible(String idCliente, int idPlan) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Allows a client to select and contract an available plan from the catalog. Creates a copy of the selected plan template and adds it to the client's contracted plans. The plan is searched first in mobile plans, then in home plans.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who is contracting the plan
      idPlan - ID of the plan template to be contracted
      Returns:
      Success message or error message if plan is not found
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • solicitarPlanPersonalizado

      public String solicitarPlanPersonalizado(String idCliente, String descripcion) throws UsuarioNoencontrado
      Allows a client to request a customized plan that doesn't match existing templates. Creates a petition-type PQRS with the plan description for advisor review. Advisors can then create a tailored plan based on the client's specific needs.
      Parameters:
      idCliente - Client's ID who is requesting the customized plan
      descripcion - Detailed description of the desired customized plan features
      Returns:
      Success message indicating the request was submitted
      Throws:
      UsuarioNoencontrado - if the client is not found

    • calcularPagoMensualPlan

      public double calcularPagoMensualPlan(int idPlan)
      Calculates the monthly payment for a specific plan. Searches for the plan in both available mobile and home plan catalogs. Applies the discount percentage to the base service value.
      Parameters:
      idPlan - ID of the plan to calculate payment for
      Returns:
      The monthly payment amount after discount, or 0 if plan is not found
